name: CORONAVIRUS Vs. WORLD (SERGIOManOwaR)
description:
It's the war! Defeat coronavirus around the world! Control defences to attack virus and defend human cells.

----------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

* Use W,A,S,D or ARROWS to MOVE DEFENSES. 

* Defenses will automatically attack virus on the way. 

* CLICK on screen (or [Ctrl]) to gather all defenses together. 

* CLICK on one virus to order: ATTACK. 

* CLICK on one CELL to order: DEFEND. 

* CLICK on MEDICINE button to inject some defenses. 

* CLICK on Bubbles to make em' explode!

DEFEAT CORONAVIRUS ALONG 6 STAGES!!

---------------------------------- 

WORK IN PROGRESS!

- Still can be added more stages and some stuff.

----------------------------------

#####################

* FIRST PLAYER TO COMPLETE THE GAME WILL BE CREDITED IN NEXT VERSION * IF YOU WANT A COUNTRY TO BE ADDED, POST YOUR DEMAND. 

* HELP THE GAME POSTING COMMENTS OR SHARING.

#####################
